sentence: Dreams eat colorless sleep because time tastes purple
Mathematics breathes 7 infinities inside equations because logic dances
Silence touches loud whispers gently everywhere because sound feels soft
Yesterday visits tomorrow frequently at never because when is where
Gravity thinks heavy thoughts slowly downward because weight remembers falling
Words swallow their own meanings hungrily here because language eats itself
Blue numbers sing 3 colors loudly nowhere because synesthesia lives
Darkness illuminates 2 shadows brightly inside light because opposite is same
Questions answer themselves repeatedly everywhere because knowing unknows
Love measures infinite heartbeats carefully forever because emotion calculates joy
Mirrors reflect 1 truthfulness deeply inside surfaces because seeing sees itself
Emptiness fills all nothingness completely here because void contains everything
Fear conquers brave courage daily at battlefields because weakness strengthens
Music paints 5 symphonies visually above because sound draws pictures
Memory forgets 2 remembrances slowly yesterday because past futures now
Happiness weighs 3 smiles heavily at scales because joy measures sadness
Stars whisper ancient secrets quietly below because sky speaks earth
Truth lies 7 honestly falsely everywhere because real is unreal
Circles think square thoughts roundly inside geometry because shape has mind
Freedom imprisons wild liberty carefully at cages because escape captures
